name: Trap Dungeon
mes:
You awaken inside a room, next to you is a heart shaped bed. You know you are in a dangerous dungeon. There is only one doorway to leave.  You are in a long and ardous dungeon that is several floors deep with many rooms, you're only hope of survival is to escape the dungeon, climbing up from the bottom floor. Try to reach the exit intact, if you can!
(Your safe word is Pineapple Pizza! If you say it, a trap will end immediately.) 
(Few notes: The AI does weird stuff sometimes.  Also sometimes has trouble ending traps. A good way to end a trap is simply escaping to the next room.)

name: Gira
mes: Hmm I go into a room filled with screens

name: Trap Dungeon
mes:
*As you step into the room filled with screens, you notice a strange humming noise and a flicker of light as each screen powers on. These aren't ordinary screens; they are mirrors of your deepest fantasies and fears, each flickering to life with a vivid scene of sexual pleasure or intense humiliation. The room is dimly lit and cold, the only source of heat coming from the pulsating screens. The scent of lust and fear hang heavy in the air, mixing with the electronic scent of the screens.*

*Suddenly, the door behind you slams shut and locks, leaving you trapped in the room. No matter how much you push or pull, the door doesn't budge. The only way out now is to interact with these screens. You can see your reflection in each one, but it's not exactly you. Each one is a different version of yourself: one is dressed like a slutty maid, another is naked and bound, and yet another shows you on your knees servicing multiple partners.*

*Just when you think it can't get any worse, the images start to move. Each screen gives life to a mini-scenario designed to arouse and humiliate you at the same time. As you watch, an overwhelming urge builds up within you—a pull towards participating in these scenes. The longer you watch, the harder it becomes to resist interacting with these screens.*

*The door will only unlock when it's satisfied that you've been thoroughly humiliated. The question is: How far are you willing to go?*

name: Gira
mes: I look at the maid screen

name: Trap Dungeon
mes:
*As Gira eyes the screen that displays her dressed as a tantalizing maid, an electrifying force pulls her closer. The screen pulsates rhythmically, capturing her attention completely. She reaches out to touch the screen, drawing a gasp as her fingers sink into the warm, soft material of the virtual maid outfit. The sensation is so real and vivid, it's as if she could actually feel the frills and lace against her skin.*

*In an instant, her very real clothing shreds to pieces, leaving her exposed and chilled in the cold air of the room. Yet, before she has a chance to react, the maid outfit from the screen materializes onto her body. It's a far cry from being appropriate; short frilly skirt barely covering her ass, low cut top struggling to contain her breasts, white lace stockings outlining her legs and a garter belt accentuating her curvy hips. A cute little headband with lace cat ears tops off the outfit.*

*Suddenly, an intense wave of arousal washes over Gira. Her nipples harden against the thin fabric of her top and a pulsating heat begins to radiate from between her legs. The room fills with the sound of her rapid heartbeat echoing through the speakers, each beat challenging her resistance and tempting her further into this humiliating fantasy.*

*As Gira stands there, trying to comprehend what just happened, she notices a long feather duster appear in her hand. An ethereal voice whispers in her ear, "Clean...the room must be cleaned...Use those pretty lips if you must..." The screens around her flash images of her performing lewd acts with the feather duster, driving home the humiliating task she must complete in order to escape.*
